About

  • Home
  • About

About Us

Our Foundation is Built on Trust and Excellence.

Play Video

Our Vision

Build a sustainable future by creating innovative, eco-friendly, & resilient construction solutions

Our Mission

Our mission is to design and construct high-quality, environmentally conscious buildings
Our journey began with a commitment to excellence, and that commitment remains at the core of our operations today. We’ve grown from a small local business into a trusted partner for both residential and commercial

Dudley French

Director of Brickon Company

Our history

Timeless Spaces Crafted with Passion Since 2001

  • 2001
  • 2007
  • 2013
  • 2020
  • 2024

2001

Founded

From humble beginnings, a proud story of growth, vision, commitment, inspiration and innovation. Our roots are deep, our standards are unmatched, our dedication is timeless.
Our clients cover a wide range of sectors including local, state, territory and Commonwealth governments, retail and sales, hospitality, commercial, health and aged care, industrial and manufacturing, civil works and defence, as well as medium-density residential, in the Northern City and South England.
Focusing on medium to large-scale commercial construction projects, we work with both investors and developers to create landmarks that make an impact.

Winning Awards

Our Value

Building On Integrity & Excellence

Quality Excellence

We deliver craftsmanship and attention to detail in every project, ensuring the highest standards of construction.

Creative Innovation

We embrace new technologies and creative approaches to offer modern, efficient, and sustainable construction.

Team Collaboration

Ensuring seamless execution of your project with our expert team from planning to completion.

Innovation Driven

We embrace new technologies and creative approaches to offer modern, efficient, and sustainable construction.

Safety Commitment

We commit to eco-friendly construction methods, minimizing our environmental footprint and promoting a healthier future

Transparency Trust

Open communication and honest dealings are at the heart of our operations, building long-lasting.

Let's Build Something Great Together!

Contact us today, and let the journey to your dream construction project begin!
